licence_overview:
If you want to have 3 or more category C or D gaming machines on your premises, you must hold a gaming machine permit. Applications should be made, along with the appropriate fee, to the Licensing Board of your local council.

If you do not already hold a licence to sell alcohol for consumption on your premises, your application will be refused.
licence_short_description: Get a gaming machine permit to have three or more category C or D gaming machines on your premises.
overview: You must have a gaming machine permit to have three or more category C or D gaming machines on your premises
title: Licensed premises gaming machine permit (Scotland)
